org.orgName: District Court of the United States

div1.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES IN AND FOR THE DISTRICT OF ARIZONA.
United States of America, vs. Leroy Smith, Defendant. C-287 Tucson.
United States of America, District of Arizona. ss:

I, Mose Brachman, Clerk of the United States District Court for the District of Arizona, do hereby certify the foregoing three pages to be true and complete copies of the Indictment, Committment and Order changing place of Confinement, entered in the above entitled action, as the same appears from the records of this office.
Witness my hand and the seal of said Court affixed hereto this 23rd day of August, A.D., 1916.
